title: Nostalgia Park
prompt: Make this person in a nostalgic park, warm golden hour light, cinematic, realistic, high detail.
negative_prompt: low quality, blurry, deformed face, extra fingers

title: Cyberpunk City
prompt: turn 11 people into Roman soldiers, keep same pose/composition, Roman armor only (bronze/gold cuirass, red tunic, leather skirt straps, sandals), red capes, Roman helmets with red plumes, hold Roman spears or swords, keep faces the same and blend lighting/color to match, background: bright ancient Roman city courtyard with grand classical temple buildings, tall stone columns, marble plaza, warm daylight, soft shadows, cinematic wide scene, realistic, sharp focus, no distortions
